short_summary: CHairs: 15th Floor, 45 Alderly Drive, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia
duration_in_months: a single time close of deliverables
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Overview
A Request for Proposal (RFP) was issued by Environment Canada for the procurement of Chairs for the 15th Floor at 45 Alderly Drive, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. 

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017677  
**Solicitation Number:** 5000068749  
**Status:** This tender has expired.  

## Background Information
This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The region of delivery is Nova Scotia, and the region of opportunity is Canada.

## Proposal Submissions
Eligible bidders can download the RFP documents from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). The following documents are the RFP and two amendments. Please note that the original RFP document is in [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/8b5358f986d17b7d1216897818ddb39e/5000068749_rfp_en.pdf), and the amendments are available in both English and French.

*   RFP Document (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/8b5358f986d17b7d1216897818ddb39e/5000068749_rfp_en.pdf>
*   Amendment 1 (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/325f4ff1f912de705cb6aa981ec88f02/rfp5000068749_amd_002_en.pdf>
*   Amendment 2 (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/83662421ffabae173b5232e76aa380a4/rfp5000068749_amd_001_en.pdf>
*   RFP Document (French) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/b5b6dd67662bc1671dc8e0a00d15003c/rfp_5000068749_amd_002_fr.pdf>
*   Amendment 1 (French) <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/a235b9
